Domain Names.

Domain Names

Domain Names can be hard to get a handle on, expensive, and difficult to manage. A lot of people struggle when it comes to choosing who to buy a domain from, often opting for someone they later find doesnâ€™t support the things that they wanted.

Our Take

Our favourite domain provider is A Small Orange, a green company with fairly amazing customer support.

To save you some trouble, we can provide domain names at cost through A Small Orange, and manage them for you. If you later want to manage it yourself, we can pass ownership to you. (This may involve varying costs due to domain name registration transfer rules).

Most domains start at $15 USD
